Master Answer:
In BC, adults are eligible to receive one or two doses of the measles, mumps rubella vaccine depending on the year you were born. Go here to see other vaccines you may need as an adult. Publicly funded (free) vaccines from your local health unit. Find a location  here to make an appointment. 
Immunization Nurse
